scripts.gitpod-prepare: npm run git-shh-to-https; (yes | sudo apt install screen); (yes | sudo apt install rsync); (yes | sudo apt install net-tools); screen -S docker -d -m sudo docker-up
scripts.packages-ci: (cd packages; for d in */; do (cd $d && npm ci); done)
scripts.deeplinks: (cd node_modules/@deepcase/deeplinks; npm run unmigrate; npm run migrate;)
scripts.deeplinks-app: (cd packages/deeplinks-app; screen -S deeplinks-app -d -m bash -c 'PORT=3007 npm run dev';)
scripts.deeplinks-app-build: cd packages/deeplinks-app; export ASSET_PREFIX='.'; npm run build; npm run export;
scripts.deeplinks-app-electron: cd packages/deeplinks-app; npx cap copy electron; npx cap open electron;
scripts.hasura: (cd node_modules/@deepcase/hasura; screen -S hasura -d -m npm run docker)
scripts.local: export npm_config_yes=true; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0; export HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=localhost:3007; npm ci; (npm run hasura; sleep 10; npm run deeplinks-app; sleep 15; npm run deeplinks; sleep 15;)
scripts.build: (export npm_config_yes=true; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0; export HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=localhost:3007; npm ci; npm run deeplinks-app-build; npm run deeplinks-app-electron;)
scripts.clear: (npm run rm-migrates; killall screen; cd node_modules/@deepcase/hasura/local/; docker-compose down; docker rm -f $(docker ps -a -q); docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -q))
scripts.gitpod: export npm_config_yes=true; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=https://$(echo $(gp url 3007) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=1; export HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=$(gp url 3007); npm run gitpod-prepare; npm ci; (npm run hasura; sleep 10; npm run deeplinks-app; sleep 15; npm run deeplinks; sleep 15;)
scripts.git-shh-to-https: git config --global url."https://".insteadOf git://; git config --global url."https://github.com/".insteadOf ssh://git@github.com/;
